import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";// Soft UI Dashboard PRO React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var transparent=colors.transparent,light=colors.light,info=colors.info,secondary=colors.secondary;var size=typography.size;var buttonBoxShadow=boxShadows.buttonBoxShadow;export default{base:{minHeight:pxToRem(42),color:light.main,borderColor:light.main,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(12)," ").concat(pxToRem(24)),"&:hover":{opacity:0.75,backgroundColor:transparent.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOfNotHover},"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," !important")}},small:{minHeight:pxToRem(34),padding:"".concat(pxToRem(8)," ").concat(pxToRem(32)),fontSize:size.xs,"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(12)," !important")}},large:{minHeight:pxToRem(49),padding:"".concat(pxToRem(14)," ").concat(pxToRem(64)),fontSize:size.sm,"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(22)," !important")}},primary:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,borderColor:info.main,"&:hover":{backgroundColor:transparent.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOfNotHover}},secondary:{backgroundColor:transparent.main,borderColor:secondary.main,"&:hover":{backgroundColor:transparent.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOfNotHover}}};
